setinverse <- function(inverse) inv <<- inverse  
getinverse <- function() inv                     
list(set = set, get = get, setinverse = setinverse, getinverse = getinverse)  
                                                                              
cacheSolve <- function(x, ...) {
inv <- x$getinverse()
if(!is.null(inv)) {
message("getting cached data")
return(inv)
}
data <- x$get()
inv <- solve(data, ...)
x$setinverse(inv)
inv
}
